resources.string: Add another word or two. Uncommon words are better.
Use a few words, avoid common phrases.
No need for symbols, digits, or uppercase letters.
All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess as all-lowercase.
"Reversed words aren't much harder to guess."
"Predictable substitutions like '@' instead of 'a' don't help very much."
Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns.
Avoid dates and years that are associated with you.
This is a top-10 common password.
This is a top-100 common password.
This is a very common password.
This is similar to a commonly used password.
A word by itself is easy to guess.
Names and surnames by themselves are easy to guess.
Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
Repeats like >abcabcabc>>are only slightly harder to guess than >abc>.
Sequences like abc or 6543 are easy to guess.
Recent years are easy to guess.
Dates are often easy to guess.
Avoid recent years, avoid years that are associated with you.

With the airCloud Home app, you can remotely monitor and control your ACs from anywhere in the world at any point of time.
You only operate the airCloud Home app when it is necessary, the app will handle the rest.
The airCloud Home app provides you with powerful features such as weekly timer to maximize the energy efficiency of your ACs.

The adapter is compatible only with 2.4 GHz wireless network.

Make sure the 2.4 GHz wireless network is well activated on your router.

In case of dual band router, If a specific SSID is used for the 2.4 GHz wireless network, connect your smartphone to this specific SSID. If both 2.4 and 5 GHz wireless network are using the same SSID, just connect your smartphone to this wireless network.

Note:" The air-conditioner's wireless network (SSID) details can be located either on the side panel or by lifting the front panel of your air-conditioner.
This information is also available in the user manual of your air-conditioner."

The adapter is compatible only with <font color=#c3002f>2.4 GHz</font> wireless network. Make sure the <font color=#c3002f>2.4 GHz</font> wireless network is well activated on your router. In case of dual band router, if a specific SSID is used for the <font color=#c3002f>2.4 GHz</font> network, connect your smartphone to this specific SSID. If both 2.4 and 5 GHz networks are using the same SSID, just connect your smartphone to this wireless network.
Please lift the front panel of your air-conditioner and locate QR code placed near the filter.
The QR code can be located on either the side panel or under the front panel of your air-conditioner.

"Please note that your air-conditioner will be paired with the following wireless network (SSID).
If you want to pair the air conditioner with another wireless network, click on the "Change Wireless Network button to connect your phone to another wireless network (SSID).
Please note that your air-conditioner will be paired with the following wireless network.

Your smartphone is currently connected to another wireless network. Please click on the Change Wireless Network button and select the following wireless network to connect your smartphone to the air-conditioner and proceed with the pairing process.

"Your smartphone is currently connected to another wireless network (SSID).
Please click on the "Change Wireless Network button and select the following wireless network (SSID) and complete the pairing process.
Please wait while we connect your smartphone to your wireless network.

"Use the MODE button on the adapter to activate AP mode.
1. Press and hold the MODE button for approximately 4 seconds. 2. AP mode is activated: LED 2 flashes orange and the gateway generates its WiFi network. 3. Continue the procedure by pressing the arrow at the top right of the screen."

"Please press the designated button on your air-conditioner's remote control. Because the buttons combination might vary depending on the model, please refer to the User Guide for complete information."

"Use the MODE button on the adapter to activate WPS mode:
1. Press and hold the MODE button for approximately 4 seconds. 2. AP mode is activated (LED 2 flashes orange) 3. Press the MODE button again for 4 seconds. 4. WPS mode is activated in turn, LED 1 flashes green. 5. Continue the procedure by pressing the arrow at the top right of the screen."

"Please click on the WPS (Wireless Protected Setup) button on your wireless router to start the pairing. (Depending on your router, you might have to long-press the WPS button, please refer your router's manual for detailed information)"
Please enter the SSID name of the air-conditioner to proceed with the pairing process.

"Please note that your air-conditioner will be paired with the following wireless network.
Please enter the password for your Wireless network to proceed with the pairing process."

Your smartphone is currently not connected to wireless network. Please click on the Change Wireless Network button and select the following wireless network to connect your smartphone to the air-conditioner and proceed with the pairing process.

"The air-conditioner's wireless network (SSID) details can be located by lifting the front panel of your air-conditioner.
This information is also available in the user manual of your air-conditioner."

"The air-conditioner's type can be identified by looking at the wireless network (SSID) details can be located on the side panel of your air-conditioner.
This information is also available in the user manual of your air-conditioner."
"The adapter's wireless network (SSID) details can be located at the backside of the adapter. This information is also available in the user manual of your adapter."

"The air-conditioner's wireless network (SSID) details can be located on the side panel of your air-conditioner.
This information is also available in the user manual of your air-conditioner."
In order to pair this AC with another wireless network, the existing pairing configuration will be erased and replaced by the new paring configuration.
Please select the type of your air-conditioner, whether you have a built-in wireless unit or an external wireless adapter.

Select the AP method and follow the step-by-step instructions to easily connect the air-conditioner. Else, if your wireless internet router supports WPS (Wireless Protected Setup), you can select the WPS method to automatically connect the air-conditioner to your wireless network.
Please place the QR code in the center of the scanner.
Please select the AC type in order to proceed with the pairing process.
Please select wireless network by clicking on change wireless network

Your smartphone is currently connected to another wireless network. Please click on the Change Wireless Network button and select the following wireless network (SSID) to connect your smartphone to the air-conditioner and proceed with the pairing process.

"Please switch on your AC now. Once the AC is switched on, it will automatically set to pairing mode for 10 minutes.
If the AC is already switched on, please switch off and switch on your AC before proceeding to the next step."
This AC has already been paired with a wireless network.
We encountered an error while configuring the AC.
Want to pair with a different Wireless network?
If you want to pair the AC with another Wireless network, click on the Change Wireless Network... button to connect your phone to another wireless network (SSID).
What happens if the pairing process takes more than 10 minutes?

The pairing process typically takes about 5 minutes. However, if the pairing process does not complete within 10 minutes, please restart the pairing process after switching off the AC and switching it on again. This will set the AC to pairing mode.
Dates and years associated with you
The password should contain atleast 8 characters including atleast one lower case character, one upper case character and one digit (0–9).
Please select a method for raising a service request.

string.name: smartFence_alert_notelocationAccess
string.b: Note: airCloud Home collects location data to enable Smart-Fence even when the app is closed or not in use.

resources.string: Please use the Icon to mark your current location.
Selected ACs does not support common Mode. Please select individual AC or select ACs which have common Mode.
Switch On After and Switch Of After time difference should be minimum 10 minutes
Please select start and end date in same format
"Selected time can't be less than current time."
Switch off at time should be greater than Switch on at time
